```
circleMidpoint d r = go 0 (-r) k0
    where k0 = 5 - 4 * r
          x1 = ceiling (fromIntegral r / sqrt 2)
          go x y k | x > x1    = return ()
                   | k > 0     = d (x,y) >> go (x+1) (y+1) (k+8*x+8*y+20)
                   | otherwise = d (x,y) >> go (x+1)  y    (k+8*x+12)

```
